about_the_game:
Tyrannosaurus, Triceratops, and Trilobites oh my! Check out this fantastic pack of Dinosaurs and Neolithic-age characters from Thalzon. Featuring dozens of Dinosaurs plus cavemen, spiders, sea monsters, sabre-toothed tigers, and giant birds of prey.

Features:

* 66 Prehistoric characters
* Covers the essential range of Prehistoric creatures
* Royalty free use with RPG Maker MZ or the engine of your choice

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Prehistoria" and "RPG Maker MV - Prehistoria" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!


About the Game
